Description: Fragment of a papyrus document with Coptic text on recto (7 lines, along the fibres: an order to sell plaited work) and verso (9 lines, against the fibres: part of a letter). Mounted with EA 75331 and 75332.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118074) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118074)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Bawit Clackson 87; P.Bawit Clackson 21
